A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It looks good\, there's lots of cool design choices and effects\, the actors are great specifically Hamill.
But poor character development\, poor world building and a really awful plot are where this fails. 
The Force Awakens provided a wealth of plot holes to fill and build a new mythos around and opportunities for a hypothetically great sequel\, this one may as well have come out of left field with no concern for a continuous storyline. 
Objectively it's terrible and I hope I never have to see Rian Johnson torture an audience ever again. Lucasfilm/Disney\, please for the love of god cancel his trilogy.
